title: How To Talk To A Mormon | Unapologetic Episode 22
itunes:title: How To Talk To A Mormon | Unapologetic Episode 22
description:
Senators, Business Leaders, and maybe even your neighbor are part of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints. Do you what they believe? Welcome to Unapologetic, where we defend truth without compromise with Dr. Bobby Conway, the One Minute Apologist; and your host, Tim Hull. 

Mental Health Crash Course- oneminuteapologist.com/mhcc

 

Apologetics Crash Course- oneminuteapologist.com/acc

T-Shirts and Sweatshirts- https://teespring.com/stores/one-minute-apologist

Become A Patron-www.patreon.com/oneminuteapologist 

Become a financial team member of the One Minute Apologist and get exclusive access to content on the website. If you have questions about anything in this episode, Bobby will answer them for our team members on a once a month webinar. Join the team by visiting oneminuteapologist.com

 

Do you ever doubt your ability to answer bigger than life questions like, “Why do I exist? What is the purpose of life? Can I know God? If so, how? Are miracles possible?” And if God exists what’s with all the evil in the world? Do questions like these ever nag at you? If so, you’ve come to the right podcast. I too am a fellow wonderer who thinks about stuff like this.

I (Bobby Conway) am the founder and host of the rapidly-growing ministry, The One Minute Apologist, which is found on YouTube and at www.oneminuteapologist.com. Here I provide quick, credible answers to apologetic questions that resource people with a hunger to defend their Christian faith. These videos will often include interviews. I’ve had the privilege of interviewing some of the world’s leading Christian apologists. Among them are: William Lane Craig, Josh McDowell, Hank Hanegraaff, JP Moreland, Norman Geisler, Frank Turek, and many more.
